body.name: Disney Frozen Kids Folding Table & Chairs Set for Kid and Toddler 36 Months Up to 7 Years, Includes: 1 Table (36" L x 24" W x 20" H), 2 Chairs (13" L x 13.5" W x 21" H) Weight Limit: 70 lb
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 9 hrs 20 mins
features: Join your favorite friends with the Disney Drozen Folding Kids and Toddler Activity Table Set from Jakks Pacific!
Includes folding table for your kids and toddlers to use for drawing, eating & playing with padded fold up chairs for extra comfort and easy travel
Designed for durability and safety with sturdy metal tubular construction and double locking mechanism
Kids sized (ages 36 months up to 7 years) – 36in L x 24in W table top x 20in H, Chair: 13"L x 13.5"W x 21"H, Weight Limit: 70 lbs. Assembly required (tool included)

Customer service: at JAKKS Pacific, your customer feedback is very important to us – should you need to contact us, Please send an email with details to consumers@jakks.com so we can best address your needs – we look forward to doing all that we can to ensure you are happy with your purchase!
body.description: With this folding table and 2 chair set from JAKKS Pacific, sitting at the kid's table has never been more fun. With bright colored chairs and table, your children are bound to have a blast whether they're eating, playing games, drawing, or learning. Perfect for playrooms, classrooms, day cares, Sunday schools and kids rooms. The set includes bright character graphics which is ideal for children's rooms. A terrific way for children to socialize and learn table manners. Use as a game table, LEGO table or a place to put your children's favorite toys, puzzles, and coloring books. A must-have for day cares and nurseries. Also ideal for waiting rooms, and doctor's office, and any space where children need a play place. Sturdy metal tubular steel construction: water-resistant and durable, this table and chairs set will withstand all children's play time. Easy to clean surface and easy to assemble: Table and chairs set come disassembled and can be put together easily with the included tool. Promote your child's imagination while providing them a safe and colorful place to learn & play with this fun and colorful table and chairs set. So sit back and enjoy the freedom your kids will experience, by having a table of their very own.
